plot: When a promising record company president is arrested, his daughter takes over his company to promote her own rock and roll music by promoting various young singers.
title: Ragazzi del Juke-Box
plot_es: When a promising record company president is arrested, his daughter takes over his company to promote her own rock and roll music by promoting various young singers.
plot_en: When a promising record company president is arrested, his daughter takes over his company to promote her own rock and roll music by promoting various young singers.
